sources.title: TheArtistAndTheCity1956 201806
sources.description: Synopsis A wonderful short film that examines a series of watercolors of the city of Porto painted by Portugese artist António Cruz. A painter wanders around the city of Oporto painting what he sees: old and modern buildings, people arriving and leaving work in the factories, children playing. The film shows a series of watercolor paintings by Portuguese artist António Cruz of what he sees while walking through different parts of the city of Porto. It was the first color film directed by Oliveira. Cast: António Cruz
